name: Bim!Ball
description:
Bim!Ball is a brutal 3D brawler plunged in the frenzy of AMERICAN FOOTBALL. In a WILD ARENA, you embody the unforgiving KNIGHTERBACK, an absolute BRUTE set to score a TOUCHDOWN at any cost and MIXING IT UP with whoever would end up on his way...
But be sure to keep the ball in your hands otherwise, you may concede a REVERSE TOUCHDOWN & LOSE THE GAME !

Jostling among various enemies, and a compendium of juicy FXs, you shall master a unique dual combat system to decimate your enemies.

Make good use of your fists and the ball to clean up the field & WIN THE GAME !

Made with Unreal Engine 4

Controls :

LB/RB : Spin to deflect attacks
Y Hold : Aim - Y Released : Throw Ball
X : Strike
A : Jump
B : Released the ball
Left Stick : Walk / Run
Right Stick : Move Camera

When the ball isn't in your hands you can press Y to Rush on it !
